overview: Cardi B is one of the most famous artists of the last decade. Despite being a "regula degula schmegula" girl from the Bronx, she became one of the most influential female artists of all time. She knew if she wanted to reach her dreams, she would have to work - Hard. On the streets, there's a fine line between wrong and right, good and bad. Her journey to the top, although successful, isn't seen as ideal. But she isn't ashamed of it. She started from the bottom and hustled her way to the top. She stays true to her roots and celebrates these factors in her music today. Best-loved for her wild personality, individual sound and passion for current affairs. She is unapologetically herself and is celebrated by her fans as keeping it real on and off stage.
title: Cardi B: The Hustle
